participant_1.background:
I grew up in wisconsin.
I love cold weather and snow.
I work as a managerial consultant.
My favorite band is metallica.

participant_2.background:
My father served in our military in the war.
I enjoy cross stitch and quilting.
My parents were proud immigrants to america.
I am proud to be an american.
I am what people call a baby boomer.

content.text: I grew up in Wisconsin, and I love the cold weather and snow. What's your favorite season?
I love the fall, when the leaves are changing colors. It's also the time of year when my parents visit from out of town.
I know what you mean. I love the fall too. It's a great time to go for walks in the woods.
Do you like to cross stitch or quilt?
No, I've never tried either of those things. I'm more of an outdoorsman.
That's okay. I like to keep busy in the winter with crafts. It helps me pass the time.
I can understand that. I usually just read books or watch movies in the winter.
I like to do that too. I also like to watch football games.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the Green Bay Packers.
Oh, that's my favorite team too! I'm glad to meet another Packers fan.
Me too! I'm always looking for someone to talk football with.
Me too. I'm always up for a good debate about football.
I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun talking about football.
